original_text: It repenteth me that I have set up Saul to be king: for he is turned back from following me, and hath not performed my commandments. And it grieved Samuel; and he cried unto the Lord all night.
korean_text: 내가 사울을 왕으로 세운 것을 후회하노니 그가 돌이켜서 나를 따르지 아니하며 내 명령을 행하지 아니하였음이니라 하신지라 사무엘이 근심하여 온 밤을 여호와께 부르짖으니라

sentences.original_text: that I have set up Saul to be king
for he is turned back from following me
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 나를 따르지 않고 돌아섰기 때문이니

sentences.original_text: and hath not performed my commandments
and he cried unto the Lord all night
